Text:
function EP03_28_03()
  --.結-3C【9月第4週】「アナタの隣に恋焦がれ」
  SaveData.Title = "アナタの隣に恋焦がれ"

  --//BG：病院の廊下
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

  MSG([[ After Minato headed to the academy, I decided to visit the hospital where Marika was admitted. ]])

  MSG([[ There were two purposes. First, to tidy up Marika's surroundings on behalf of busy Minato. ]])

  MSG([[ And second, to have Marika listen to these hazy feelings filling my chest right now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0486.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Haa... Coming all the way to the hospital to vent to Sleeping Beauty, I can no longer laugh at Minato anymore." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0487.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "But if Marika listens to me, maybe this haze in my chest will ease a little..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ While muttering to myself as if to wipe away my anxiety, I arrived in front of Marika's hospital room. ]])

  MSG([[ I reached to open the sliding door, but then I noticed voices coming from inside the room. ]])

  --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0488.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Besides Minato and me, who else could it be...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I quietly opened the sliding door just a crack and peeked inside._r There, a somewhat familiar woman was standing in front of Marika's bed. ]])

  MSG([[ Apparently, she was speaking to the perpetually sleeping Marika. ]])

  MSG([[ Eavesdropping, I just barely caught what she was saying―― ]])
  --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0489.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (…Eh!? Did she just say that she’s the one who cornered Marika?) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0490.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (Right. That person is from Yuriai Private Academy... No way...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Even the part I managed to hear sent a chill down my spine. I never imagined that "she" would be the one who pressured Marika. ]])

  MSG([[ I can't even imagine how shocked kind-hearted Minato would be if he found out by accident. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0491.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "I mustn’t let Minato suffer any more... I have to tell him myself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Without letting "her" notice, I quietly left the hospital room. ]])

  MSG([[ Just as I was about to head back to Yuriai Private Academy, I suddenly remembered this morning's events. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0492.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (After what happened earlier... how am I supposed to face him?) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0493.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (Knowing Minato, he might have been waiting for me... Ugh, getting all emotional right before the important Princess Election—ugh, I’m such an idiot, idiot, idiot!) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0494.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "No good... I can’t be any more of a burden to Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Meeting Minato with this fragile state of mind and snapping at him would be terrible. ]])

  MSG([[ After much hesitation, I gave up on going to Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

  MSG([[ But what I said this morning must be troubling Minato. I don’t want to continue being a burden to him. ]])

  MSG([[ Feeling exasperated at my own weakness, I called Minato. ]])
  --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

  --//BG：校門前
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

  MSG([[ Unconsciously, I had walked up to the deserted school gate. ]])

  MSG([[ There’s no way I’ll meet Akira here. ]])

  MSG([[ Because I left her behind and came to Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

  MSG([[ Even though she was suffering, I prioritized everyone at the academy. ]])

  MSG([[ I held on to a faint hope that maybe she would come after me. ]])

  MSG([[ I can’t help but feel pathetic about myself. ]])
  --//SE：着信音
PLAY_SE("SEb011.wav")
WAIT(500)

  MSG([[ Noticing the ringtone, I looked at my phone and saw Akira's name displayed. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0762.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "H-Hello!? Akira!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I hurriedly answered the call, hearing Akira’s faint voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0495.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Minato, I’m sorry for worrying you this morning. I’m calmer now, so please leave me alone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0763.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "L-Leave you alone!? That’s impossible!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0496.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "...I realized something. The biggest burden to Minato is me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0497.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Looking at Minato recently, there’s someone else he wants to spend the school festival with besides me, right? You should make memories with that person." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0764.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "That’s not true—Akira is not a burden at all. I want to watch the school festival with you, and I want you to watch the Princess Election too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0765.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Hiyu and Lira have reserved seats so you can watch the Princess Election with peace of mind. Being with them will make you feel safe." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0766.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "So please... don’t say such sad things. Come to Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0498.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "...Understood. There are things I have to tell you, so after I’ve sorted my feelings out, I’ll come to watch the Princess Election. But that’s the limit." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0499.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Minato... please enjoy your youth properly. My greatest happiness is seeing you smile." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0767.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "A-Akira!? When you get to the academy, contact me, okay!? Akira, Akira――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
  --//SE：通話の切れる音
PLAY_SE("SEb020.wav")
WAIT(500)

  MSG([[ The call ended without a word, leaving me standing there stunned. ]])

  MSG([[ It’s true that when I thought about who I want to watch the White Sun Festival with, someone other than Akira came to mind. ]])

  MSG([[ Maybe Akira had noticed my true feelings. ]])

  MSG([[ That someone becoming more important to me than Akira and Marika Onee-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0768.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I’m sorry for making you feel lonely, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I can’t keep crying. Akira went out of her way to worry about me. Sobbing here would ruin everything. ]])

  MSG([[ Akira said her greatest happiness is seeing me smile. ]])

  MSG([[ For Akira’s sake, I need to properly switch my feelings and enjoy the White Sun Festival. ]])

  MSG([[ Because that is the only thing I can do for her as family right now. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0180.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Erika-san...? Why are you crying?" ]])
  --//ウラン

  --//BU：ウラン（メイド・驚き）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav")

  MSG([[ Looking up, there stood Uran-san dressed differently than usual. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0782.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "U-Uran-san, that outfit...? ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0181.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Our group is running a <r=メイド>Meido</r> Café as an attraction. I'm wearing <r=メイド>Meido</r> clothes along with everyone else." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0182.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "It’s my first time learning, but apparently when you fulfill your destiny and walk the Meido, you wear such adorable Western-style clothes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0783.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I’m sure that’s a different kind of maid." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Uran-san’s silly comment made me laugh. ]])

  MSG([[ My heavy heart felt a little lighter. ]])

  MSG([[ Whether it’s her personality or presence, I always feel at ease beside Uran-san, even when down. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0183.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "What happened? I saw Erika-san with a downcast face leaving the school building, so I came over out of concern." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0784.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I-I'm sorry to worry you. It’s just a quarrel with my sister, so don’t mind it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0785.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Seeing Uran-san’s face gave me some strength. Even though we’ll be opponents at the Princess Election soon... thank you for your kindness." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04fc")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0184.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Nonsense. As I told you recently, we are friends before we are rivals. It’s only natural to worry." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0185.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Since it’s a special occasion, why don’t you come to our shop? As one who <r=いざな>guides</r> souls to the Meido, I will serve you plenty." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0786.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Serving to guide to the Meido sounds a bit scary." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Laughing, I placed my hand over the one Uran-san offered. The warmth calmed me even more. ]])

  MSG([[ I realized once again how much Uran-san is becoming an important presence to me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0787.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 (After all, the one I want to walk the White Sun Festival with... is only Uran-san.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ The thought crossed my mind, but I gave up since we are rivals now. ]])

  MSG([[ But meeting Uran-san now like this can’t be a coincidence. I want to believe it’s not. Surely Akira gave me a push. ]])

  MSG([[ Bracing myself for rejection, I mustered the courage to invite Uran-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0788.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Uran-san, if you don’t mind, would you accompany me around the White Sun Festival?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0186.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Eh...?" ]])

  MSG([[ Uran-san looked puzzled. Such an invitation is normally impossible, so that reaction was natural. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0789.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I’m sorry for saying something strange even though we’re about to face off in the Princess Election." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0790.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "But I want to enjoy the White Sun Festival with dear friend Uran-san. This year’s festival can only be seen now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0791.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "If I don’t go around with Uran-san now, I feel I’ll regret it forever." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Uran-san covered her mouth and looked around awkwardly. ]])

  MSG([[ After a while of silence, she slowly nodded. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0187.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "...I would be delighted to accept, if that is your wish, Erika-san. It’s a great honor." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0188.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Honestly, I too wished to see the festival with Erika-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0189.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Shall we go then?" ]])

  MSG([[ Hand in hand with Uran-san, we began walking. Thus started an unexpected friendly outing with Uran-san. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

  --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

  --//BG：メインストリート（学園祭）
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019da")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

  --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0115.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "It’s the famous Yuriai Academy ‘Extra Veggie Chicken Bowl’! Those who finish it within five minutes receive a ‘Battle Princess’ bromide――" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0116.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "E-Erika Onee-sama and Uran-sama!? Why is this legendary pairing appearing!? Is this a dream…!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0117.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "K-Keep your composure! This is reality! The pure pair from Yuriai Academy is right here before you!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0118.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "Aaaaah... The most Yamato Nadeshiko of the academy and rumored returnee Erika-sama together... such a beautiful sight." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  --//BU：ウラン（メイド・苦笑）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04fc")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0190.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Just us getting along makes everyone so excited." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0792.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Since people don’t know the situation, they probably think we’re quarreling. Oh well." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0793.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "There are lots of stalls; would you like to eat something?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0191.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "May I? I’ve been interested in that stall over there." ]])

  MSG([[ Uran-san pointed at a stall labeled ‘Demon World Style French Fries.’ ]])

  MSG([[ Apparently, they sell fries with a spicy special sauce. ]])

  MSG([[ The fries sizzle in the fryer, and the aroma of fried food is rich. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0192.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "French and potatoes—I know those. France and potatoes, yes?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0794.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Yes. Adding ‘Demon World Style’ feels redundant though—it’s like saying ‘French-style potatoes of the Demon World.’" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0193.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "At home, potatoes are for simmered dishes; I’ve never eaten fried potatoes, so I’ve been curious." ]])

  MSG([[ Uran-san’s eyes sparkled as she spoke to the student frying the potatoes. ]])

  --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｇ、ウラン（メイド・笑顔）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB10aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0194.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "One order of Demon World Style French Fries, please." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0119.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "U-Uran Hime!? And Erika Hime too!? Pl-please, take as much as you want!" ]])

  MSG([[ Students rushed out of the stall and stopped Uran-san from pulling out her wallet. ]])

  MSG([[ With beast-like agility, they handed over a cup of freshly fried fries with bright red sauce. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0195.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "P-please let me pay properly!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0120.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Female Student】
 "We can’t accept money from the two about to enter the Princess Election! If our fries give you strength, that’s the best payment!" ]])

  MSG([[ Uran-san tried to pay, but they refused firmly. After expressing our thanks, we hurried on. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019da")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

  --//BU：ウラン（メイド・驚き）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0196.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Eating while walking is bad manners. Erika-san, shall we sit on those chairs and eat first?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0795.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Y-You’re right. Sorry." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019de")
  LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-700,200)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

  MSG([[ Sitting side by side on a bench Uran-san found, we began nibbling the fries. ]])

  MSG([[ I hadn’t really been mindful that eating while walking is impolite. ]])

  MSG([[ When sitting down, Uran-san casually pulled a thin cloth from her pocket and laid it where she would sit. ]])

  MSG([[ Though I’ve been at Yuriai for only six months, Uran-san, raised as a noble, clearly has much more refinement. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0197.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Erika-san, these are delicious. They’re even better dipped in this sauce; please try it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0796.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Thank you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I reached into the paper bag on Uran-san's lap, grabbed some fries, dipped them in the sauce in the cup also on her lap, and bit in. ]])

  MSG([[ Mmm, the sweet and sour tomato blends with the spicy chili—it’s tasty. The color looks fiery, so I was worried, but it’s like chili sauce. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0198.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "I’m a messenger of the Meido now. Shall I carry some potatoes for you, Erika-san?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0797.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "N-no! That’s too much honor!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU04oa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0199.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Don’t hesitate. Master, please open your mouth. Here, aahn<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

  -- //CI：あーんしてポテトを食べるエリカとウラン 068
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI068a")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0798.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "A-Aahn..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",800,false)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0200.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Ufufu<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Thank you for the food." ]])

  MSG([[ As we ate fries, casual chatter continued. ]])

  MSG([[ It felt strange to be eating fries side by side when just a few hours later we’d be opponents on stage. ]])

  MSG([[ But it was a very pleasant time. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  --//BG：3F廊下
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

  MSG([[ Then we visited various stalls around the school together. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU04da")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0201.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "The haunted house by Class 2-D was rumored to be scary, so I was looking forward to it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0799.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "The ghosts were so polite that they didn’t scare us at all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0202.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Uran】
 "Being a ‘Princess’ comes with inconveniences. If there’s a next time, I’ll hide my face with bandages to enter." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0800.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
